page.title: 05HOUSING IN RIPLEY
page.content: In Ripley there are two main types of housing, the privately owned houses and the houses that the council owns,and which people rent from the council.The council houses were built about 1959 when not many people had cars so practically no council house has a garage.Most of the council houses have chimneys because a lot of people used coal then.The newer houses were built in 1973 and are a bit different.Most of the newer houses have garages and a lot of them have gas or electric fires and no chimneys,and are a bit bigger than the council houses.
